☐ No recomendado | I have over 2k hours in this game, and I think I can safely say it's infinitely replayable and incredibly enjoyable. Great bosses, fun stat progression, sandbox building, etc. Highly recommend. | Очень классная игра. Давно играю в него спустя с мобильной версии террарии. Когда перешёл на пк версию, то было ещё веселее и приятнее. Жаль конечно что старые мобы, вещи, боссы пропали с телефонной версии, но так приятно о них вспоминать и проходить их в тмодлорде. Люблю эту игру | The game is fabulous, but a bit more handholding at the very beginning would be nice, because the moment the game started, I had no idea what I was supposed to do or how I was supposed to build anything or use my inventory, so the first few minutes were horrendous, and I was dying quite a lot, which reminded me why I instantly deleted this game many years ago when trying to play it for the very first time. This time around I decided to keep at it, and the first 10–15 hours were slow, but then I got the hang of it, and the game consumed me to the point where I lost track of time and racked up 100 hours just completing the main story and hunting for some achievements. Be prepared to keep your browser running in the background, because you are probably going be switching between the game and the Terraria Wiki quite a lot.

Game goes hard and is complex, VERY COMPLEX! But it has some cool story line. | Hyper obscure RPG FPS with a plot line in so many various threads that somehow still works. Not a game for everyone but if you want to be confused about your own morality and whatever the hell is going on while shooting things, great game. | Weird game, obtuse plot that sniffs its own butt quite a lot. Oddly fun though, especially with friends. This is the most lukewarm of my recommends, because I'm acutely aware some people will hate it, but if you like janky shooters with jankier plots but lofty ideas. You'll have a good time with it. | I bought this game because a lot of people said that it's like Brigand : Oaxaca. It's not.  At least from what I can tell.  The visuals and combat are more polished here but, it's missing the heart and atmosphere of Brigand.  Brigand is the superior game of the two in my opinion. Eye is alright.  But, it's just yet another dark cyberpunk adventure set in yet another boring dark Urban Hellscape.    At least the guns and skills help set in apart a little. | This game is often listed as rough around the edges but it is a genuinely smoother game than I expected. It is confusing at first but the more you play the more it makes sense. The game initially started as a Half Life 2 mod. 

Pros:
- Immersive world with factions, temples, battle priests, gangs, space mutants, and cyberpunk settings.
- An actual FPS/RPG with cool class builds, Counter Strike/Stalker-like gunplay, and narrative choices.
- It is biased but I am tired of most open-world games unless it really is something new or out of left field. The hub-oriented mission design has been refreshing despite the older game philosophy. Spoiler: [spoiler] The repeating nature of the story with your upgraded character is a welcome change to massive open world games going from one POI to another.[/spoiler]
- Source Engine games really have some of the best atmosphere/lighting.
- Pretty short game time. Without spoiling there is a lot to do but you can beat the campaign in about 8-12 hours. Not every game needs to be hundreds of hours.

Cons:
- The game really encumbers players early on with low endurance/movement speed. It is recommended to upgrade your cyberlegs as soon as you can to increase movement. You are forced into certain upgrades before you can customize your build.
- The level design is not the greatest. You go through a variety of environments but a lot of the spaces are barren and empty at times. 
- Movement could be a little better. This game has Q and E leaning but you can only do it when stationary which is tough.
- A lot of the story/lore is dumped to you in the archives section. I thought it worked for the game since it is about an esoteric group of cyber warrior priests so it's fitting that they would have their history inside a library. This is not the game if you are looking for cutscenes.
- Enemy spawning is an issue at times but for some reason it didn't bother me as much as it should.

If you are interested in single player FPS with RPG elements then this is a game to absolutely check out. It is considered unforgiving but the satisfaction you gain in progressing your character along with learning the world makes this a remarkable game. I really wish this company would continue working on this series rather than making Warhammer games.

I've played over 1000 hours of this game. I've seen it from it's conception to it's end. 
The community of this game is unlike any other I've ever encountered in an online group. They are vindictive, rude and destructive to the game. Throughout the entire time I played I suffered no end of trolling, mocking and the like. There were people that literally exploited the kicking function to get me off of servers so I could not play the game I paid for. 
The issue also lies with the developers whom constantly ignored community begging to get hackers out. Even to this day, after an anti-cheat patch, the game is STILL cracked, people running around with weapons they shouldn't, running fast, swinging faster than is possible. Some people even exploit the bad latency issues to win. 

There's a top 1% in this game, they are not skilled players by any stretch. Instead of skill they got together and figured out what the best ways to exploit the games mechanics. From unblockable hits to builds that were simply insanely unfair, they scared away any new players to the game by trying their best to ruin the fun for others. To this day, even now, I get on and someone is taking my Steam ID name so they can spam vote kicks so I can't play. 

Stay far, far away from this game. Think of World of Warcraft only cultivated with the worst of the worst (community) possible. The truth is I enjoyed this game but the playerbase was hellbent on seeing it go under. You have honest, fun people who are endlessly frustrated by the trolls, hackers and exploiters. 

There is no welcome mat here, just a gigantic letdown. | Покупка была многообещающей, и в начале я был доволен. Но потом розы становились все хуже и хуже. Это надо было очень хорошо постараться так испортить игру. Розы спасает только то хорошее, что осталось, да и известность издателя Paradox Interactive.
[b][h1]Какие же достоинства есть у роз?[/h1][/b]
[list]
[*] Приятная графика
[*] Настройка оружия, разные виды оружия
[*] Возможность создать своих уникальных персонажей (при покупке полной версии, естественно)
[*] Неплохая боевая система, прямо как в Mount&Blade
[*] Наличие дуэльных серверов, где запрещены лучники, толпой на одного лезть нельзя и можно потренироваться.
[/list]
[b][h1]Теперь к недостаткам:[/h1][/b]
[list]
[*] Система ударов и блоков реализована, ИМХО, криво, хотя задумка [b]правильная[/b]. В Mount&Blade похожая система, но там если хочешь ударить [b]сверху[/b], то и ударяешь [b]сверху[/b], а тут так бывает далеко не всегда.
[*] Куча игроков-спамеров, которые размахивают без конца [b]двуручным[/b] оружием, [b]вообще не делая блоки[/b], а ты просто не успеваешь заблокировать атаки, ибо некоторые двуручники, видимо, ничего не весят, и спамить ими можно на ура, даже при промахах
[*] Ограничения на количество лучников в команде не было и нет, очень весело становится, когда ими все кишит - бегаешь и умираешь чуть что. А еще учитывая возрождение возле лидера - пять лучников могут собраться в один отряд и стрелять, сколько душе угодно, возрождаясь сразу же на удобных позициях. Я то и не против самих лучников, но нужно или увеличить время респавна для них, если их много, или запретить возрождаться возле лидера. Повторюсь, ЕСЛИ ИХ МНОГО. Несколько лучников придает бою адреналина, а куча - напрочь убивает удовольствие.
[*] Раздражают ролики с собственной казнью от первого лица. Пусть будет выбор - отображать ролики с казнью или просто надпись внизу "вас прикончили". Почему мне навязывают жестокость, не давая выбора? 
[*] Серверов мало, игроков мало, нужно подбирать время, чтобы были заполненные и с хорошим пингом
[*] На ДУЭЛЬНЫХ серверах почему-то [b]разрешены казни[/b]. Что за чертовщина? Этикет таких серверов подразумевает запрет на казни в принципе, разработчики же не пожелали сделать кпопочку в настройках сервера "запретить казни", они оставили все на контроль админам серверов, которые как бы должны наказывать нарушителей и которые на сервере не столь часто, к тому же бывает, что на ДУЭЛЬНОМ сервере админ ни черта не банит, как будто так и надо. Я молчу про кучу лучников и наезд толпой,  вообще-то запрещенных на таких серверах, на которые тоже некоторым админам пофигу.
[*] Где баланс  команд по уровню прокачанности? Не завезли.
[*] Лаги, лаги, лаги. С 2012 года разрабы все никак не могут оптимизировать движок и до сих пор те, у кого компьютеры тянут всякие крайзисы с батлфилдами на максимальных, и интернет хороший, недоумевают, какого черта так лагает
[*] Разрабам положить на игру. Ну вот серьезно, гляньте на список исправлений,  даже античит выкатывался достаточно долго.
[*] Доспехи порезаны не напильником, а болгаркой, теперь тяжелые носить смысла нет, ибо теряешь в скорости, а взамен - только защита от бокового удара мечом и кинжала.
[/list]
Хорошо, что купил по скидке, было бы намного обиднее заплатить треть стоимости  ААА-проектов, где разработчики заняты улучшением продукта, а не непонятно чем. Я очень много играл в Mount&Blade и хотел бы, чтобы розы взяли оттуда лучшее.
[u]Игра очень нуждается в доработке[/u], хотя на что я надеюсь... Акулы пойдут и наштампуют еще 10 проектов, зачем улучшать старое, выкатят раз в полгода патч, который ничего не изменит, да и все.
Чувствую, сейчас фанаты, в упор не видящие недостатков в игре, опустят обзор по максимуму. Ну дело ваше, только вот, к сожалению, недостатки в розах не исправятся от того, что вы утопите обзор.
В обзоре присутствуют удачно подмеченные моменты от Malakhur, Shoers, *T!gRa, Doomer и других. | At its peak, this was one of my favorite games of all time, the combat mechanics were deep and had a steep learning curve, the armor system was very complex and logical, and above all this game rewarded the skill of the players. 

Of the 140 hours I've played, roughly 100 of them were spent on dueling servers fighting 1on1 with other players, all of whom were there because they enjoyed the actual competition or to master their skills with a new weapon. The dueling community was strong and friendly, always willing to help teach new players how to survive the game. 

But then the Devs changed things, the armor system simplified, the weapons became more powerful, crossbows became sniper rifles, hitboxes and crit chances grew, and the art of dueling was lost to the ether; replaced by polearm decapitations, across the map crossbow headshots, and stab spamming. All that is left now is the empty rotting shell of a once great game. | This game has an absolutely TERRIBLE community. It's absolutely toxic and leaves to room for enjoyment. This game is fun, but there is nothing but people you never want to meet in person. 

It's disgusting. Sadly, it ruins the game entirely. Duel servers are the worst hands down, filled with people who are both hypocritical, and completely immature.

I'd skip this one for the community alone. | Als das Spiel noch einen normalen Preis hatte war es sehr gut.
Die Grafik überzeugt und das Gameplay fand ich zu der Zeit noch ansprechender als das von seinem Marktbegleiter (Chivalry Medival Warfare).
Gerade weil man den Charakter weitergehend modifizieren konnte und man direkt auf Waffen sparen konnte.
Die Kämpfe haben Spaß gemacht und auch als Bogenschütze waren die Kämpfe anspruchsvoll aber nicht unfair.

Inzwischen ist alles anders.
Seit das Spiel Freemium (Free2Play) ist, sind die Preise der Waffen und Rüstungsteile um Faktor X gestiegen.
Inzwischen kosten fast alle waffen 100.000 Gold (umgerechnet 5-10 €?). Und das ohne weitere Upgrades.
Da die Waffen aber alle unterschiedliche Stats haben und man eine tatsächliche Ewigkeit bräuchte um das Geld in Schlachten zu verdienen ist das Spiel zu Pay2Win verkommen.

Ganz zu schweigen von den ganzen Griefern und Glitchern die selbst Standard-DM zur Hölle machen.
Rennen weg, springen auf Zäune/Dächer/Palmen(?) und verstecken sich irgendwie in Heuballen, die man selbst weder betreten kann - noch bei denen man in der Lage ist Schaden zuzufügen.
Während ich früher (Großteil meiner Spielzeit) mit positiven Stats aus dem Spiel gehn konnte.. wäre es jetzt wohl eine KD von 1/10. Ich nehme auch an dass das Game inzwischen hackerverseucht ist.. wills aber auch nicht wissen.

Das Spiel ist für mich gestorben und würde ich niemandem mehr weiter empfehlen.
So wie S4 League. Gratulation Spieleentwickler. Es ist euch wieder gelungen ein gutes Spiel schlecht zu machen.

Grafik 9/10
Gameplay 1/10
Multiplayer 1/10
Story 0/10
Spielspaß 0/10
Pay2Win - ja
Freemium - ja
Spielen? - nein.
No Reviews

Game Name: Magic: The Gathering - Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012
Reviews:
Let me tell you about Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012. It’s one of those games that’s technically still around (if you bought it back in the day), but good luck finding it if you didn’t—it’s no longer available for purchase on Steam. And that’s a shame because this game was an absolute gateway into Magic: The Gathering, wrapped up in a neat little digital package.

The gameplay was its biggest draw. You weren’t thrown into the deep end with deck-building or forced to buy card packs. Instead, you got preconstructed decks, each with its own flavor and strategy. It was perfect for newcomers who wanted to learn without getting overwhelmed and for veterans who just wanted to sit back and enjoy some streamlined battles.

The campaign gave you a solid progression system, challenging you with AI opponents that represented Magic’s iconic planeswalkers. And let’s not forget those puzzles. They weren’t just “win this match” scenarios; they were bite-sized brain teasers that tested how well you really understood the game’s mechanics. Solving them felt like a mini-victory every time.

Visually, it wasn’t flashy by today’s standards, but it had just enough flair to keep you immersed. The card art was always the star, as it should be. Spell effects were simple but satisfying, and the battlefield layout kept everything clean and easy to follow.

Multiplayer, though—that’s where this game really shined. Archenemy mode was a fan favorite, letting three players team up to take down an overpowered AI opponent. It was a blast, especially with friends. And while the PvP aspect wasn’t as deep as you’d get with physical Magic or something like MTG Arena, it was more than enough to keep things interesting.

Now, speaking of MTG Arena—yes, it’s on Steam now, and it’s great in its own right. But let’s be real: it’s not Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012. Arena is all about competitive ladder climbing and card collecting, while Duels focused on making Magic accessible and fun without the grind. No campaign, no Archenemy, just straight-up one-on-one battles. That’s fine, but it doesn’t scratch the same itch.

If you were lucky enough to buy Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012 before it disappeared, you can still download and play it today. And honestly, it holds up. It’s a reminder of a simpler time in digital Magic—a time when you didn’t need a credit card or hours of research to enjoy a game of cards. And yes, I know they had DLC content available to buy content and decks.

So yeah, this game might be off the market, but for those of us who played it, it’s a classic. And for anyone looking for something similar, MTG Arena is worth a look—but don’t expect it to capture the same magic (pun intended).

My first encounter with an indie game started with this game back when I played it on the Wii as a kid. As young as I was, nostalgia is liable to tint one's own view on the game years later, however, I only ever played the demo. Coming back to And Yet it Moves years later, with the typical cynicism many of us in our 20's begin developing towards games, I'm happy to say the full-version of this game was pretty enjoyable!

Being new to PC gaming and Steam sales, I'm beginning to develop taste for ultra short campaigns with densely packed novelty, fun, excitement, or whatever I can shake out of a $3 game. This game delivers a unique take on physics-based puzzles and I think the 3-hour campaign will convince most of you of that! | un juego que me trajo de vuelta al momento donde probé la demo de la wii. la banda sonora y el estilo del juego es increible. pura nostalgia
买的不是游戏，是青春，玩的不是游戏，是回忆！

크레파스로 그려진 배경에서 직접 선을 그려 공을 별에 닿도록 만드는 게 목표인 퍼즐게입니다. 스테이지 하나씩 까먹는 간식용게임으로 즐기기 좋았습니다. 
 단순히 선만 그리는 게 아니라 도형이나 핀, 로프 등을 만들 수 있어서 정말 다양한 풀이 방법을 시도할 수 있는 게 재밌었습니다. 그려진 선과 도형들이 중량을 가지는 점이 정말 다양한 결과를 만들어내네요. 유튜브에서 클리어영상을 보면 이렇게도 할 수 있구나 싶은 기상천외한 방법들을 보여줘서, 이미 클리어한 스테이지를 다시 한 번 해보는 재미도 있었습니다. 

 다만 추가 별을 획득하기 위해서는 과제를 달성해야 하는데, 다양한 시도를 할 수 있다는 장점이 퇴색되는 감이 있어 그 부분은 불만이었습니다. 추가 별을 획득하지 못하면 최종목표인 별 120개에는 부족하기 때문인데, 물론 하나만 그려 해결하는 방법을 궁리하는 재미도 있긴 하지만, 결국은 핀으로 오브젝트 고정해 공을 때려 움직이거나 무게 치우치게 만들어 지렛대로 공을 옮기는 방법으로 해결하게 되니까요. 각 스테이지마다 추가별 획득과제가 달랐다면 모르겠는데, 다 같은 과제다 보니 시도하는 해결법이 대부분 비슷해지게 됩니다. 
 재밌을 것 같은 방법이 떠오르면 과제 클리어 후에 다시 해봐야 한다는 점이 좀 아쉽네요.

 단순 클리어만을 목표로 하면 금방 끝나버리겠지만, 여러 가지 방법을 시도하고 별 120개 모으기를 하려면 제법 궁리하는 시간이 필요해 플레이타임은 다들 제각각일 게임입니다. | 很好的游戏，小时候的快乐时光

Чувак, ты сделал отличную игру, но сейчас запускать и играть в ЭТО - та ещё попа-боль.  Я в курсе, что у Тебя есть уже лругой проект (в списке, пока не играл), и, возможно, следующий.  НО, может быть, Ты вернешься назад на десяток лет, обновишь шедевр?  С тебя - несколько десятков часов работы (кроме разешения монитора и чувствительности мыши никего особо трогать не надо), с клиентов - некий заработок и +авторитет.  Обещяю купить "нововую специальную" версию - хотя, это, конечно, копейки... | Amazing piece of a game.. it has very unique controls, nothing seen in any other game I know. Prepare to experience something new, highly recommended! :)

Honestly, it's my favourite game in the zombie genre. It is a very cool concept that sadly is not used more often and that is actually managing evacuation efforts and fighting zombies from a government/military point of view. The mechanics of the game are pretty simple but allow for much replayability especially if you use mods such as Ground War. Mechanics are also great for getting into the mindset of so many military officials in the movies and games that simply carpet-bomb the entire parts of the city to get rid of the zombies since you will likely do something similar or be tempted to do it when things start going down. All in all great game that is worth the price | Charming little indie game and one of my first games on steam. | One of the most underated fast paced strategy zombie games of all time | Игра детства

this game generally looks much harder than it actually is, except for the "doing it the hard way" section which did take about 30 mins to beat, i didn't end up being frustrated with the game as brute forcing through problems is usually sufficient to solving them,

exploring the map is quite fun and returning to an area is simple so its best to simply enter all the holes you can find

and the music here is also amazing, making the journey a banger all the way through
its quite cheap and well worth the price for the playtime you get, and somehow it still gets occasional updates | well i dont recommend it
the control is too slippery so it actually made the game really hard
as a precision platformer it should focus more level design using clever traps to increase the difficulty rather than through antihuman controls | It's like a modern atari, and i mean that in a good way. It's very simple to learn and I had a blast playing it, plenty of side content too post main game. Would recommend picking it up! | シンプルで洗練されたステージ。ちょいむずだけど、セーブがどこにでもあるのでサクサク進める爽快感があった。
BGMが良かった。おすすめ。
 | Приятный классический платформер с интересной механикой изменения гравитации вместо прыжка. Уровни в меру сложные — вы будете много умирать, но так как возрождение моментальное и уровни небольшие, то рано или поздно вы в любом случае их пройдёте. Реальную сложность вызывают лишь некоторые необязательные уровни и достижения (к примеру, не умереть ни разу за прохождение). Однако, если для вас игра окажется тяжёлой, в настройках можно уменьшить скорость игры вплоть до 40% и вас за это никак не накажут — играйте так, как вам комфортнее!
норм

I kept shelving and retrying this game over like 5 years, always forgetting why I stopped playing it before digging it out of the rubble of my steam library a year later and then getting frustrated, deinstalling it and repeating the cycle. Now, I am leaving a review so I can actually lay this game to rest properly and remember just why I stopped playing it.

Long story short: the RNG is unbearable and the AI is too unforgiving. This game essentially has you play a mix of solitaire and poker against an AI and, to spice things up a bit, you can use power cards as well to turn the tide. The problem is that the AI simply never ever lets you play any move that may be advantageous for you, as it constantly steals useful cards the moment it sees them. The reason this happens is that every "player" gets 3 moves in one turn, and thus the AI constantly ruins your plans the moment they seem to come to fruition.

That combined with the card appearance RNG just makes the game very frustrating. You are essentially fighting a battle on two fronts; on one front, you hope for RNG to give you the right cards to make good combinations with and that you can securely tuck away in a combination before the AI can steal it; on the other front, you fight an AI that always goes for the best available combinations anyway while ruining your day. It is a battle only won with a lot of luck and patience, but sadly, it is not very fun. While the presentation of the game is intriguing, it is simply not worth going through the struggle. | The core concept of this game is essentially solitare poker againt the AI.  Matching varying combinations of cards will inflict damage against the AI (and AI to you).  The damage will increase the better the combiation, from two of a kind to a royal flush.    The game mixes things up by adding in spell cards which can be used to inflict status effects, heal, do elemental damage, etc.  The additions of the spell cards keeps the battle fresh as certain enemies require specific cards to counter their abilities.  Overall, this game is average to above-average.  I recommend a purchase of this game during a sale. | The core combat of making poker hands to fight enemies is pretty fun. The game is very shallow and has a very lackluster story with choices that impact absolutely nothing.

Get it on a sale or from a bundle. | [h1]Runespell: Overture [/h1]

Ein Rollenspiel mit Kartenspiel-Elementen bzw. ein Kartenspiel mit Rollenspiel-Elementen (sucht euch eins von beiden aus).

📝 [b][u]Story[/u][/b]

Man schlüpft in die Rolle von Raziel. Zumindest hatte ich das gesamte Spiel über das Gefühl dass der "Changeling", wie der Hauptcharakter heißt, dem guten Raziel aus Legacy of Kain ähnelt, weshalb er für mich das gesammte Spiel über diesen Namen trug. 

Die gesamte Handlung spielt in einem alternativen mittelalterlichen Europa und bezieht sich sehr oft auf die nordische Mythologie. Die Geschichte ist gut geschrieben und macht eigentlich gerade am Ende Lust auf mehr.

🎮 [b][u]Gameplay[/u][/b]

Spielerisch ist es recht simpel. Außerhalb von Kämpfen bewegt man sich über eine Weltkarte mit festen Pfaden. Auf diesen sind mehrere Punkte, von denen einige einfach passiert werden, während andere einen in einen Kampf schicken. 

Die Kämpfe werden dann durch ein rundenbasiertes Kartenspiel ausgetragen, welches eine Mischung aus Solitaire und Poker ist. Das Kampfsystem ist recht schnell erlernt, insbesondere wenn man mit einem oder beiden Kartenspielen schon vertraut ist. Verschiedene Zusatzkarten und Power-Ups ergänzen das Spiel und machen die Kämpfe interessanter. 

Leider wird es nach einigen Stunden doch etwas langweilig, da die KI nicht sonderlich effektiv spielt und nur sehr selten starke Kombinationen wie einen Royal Straight Flush anstrebt. Dadurch wird es auch zum Ende hin eher leichter als schwerer, da man dann mehr Leben hat und somit auch genug Zeit um auf die Kombinationen hinzuarbeiten die am meisten bringen.


🎥 [b][u]Grafik[/u][/b]

Die Grafik ist gut. Die einzelnen Bildschirme sind sehr übersichtlich und man kommt jederzeit an wichtige Informationen heran. Die Kartenmotive der Zusatzkarten sind teilweise ziemlich schick und auch das Gegner- und Charakterdesign ist gelungen. Zudem fand ich die kurzen Filme wunderschön anzusehen, insbesondere der Anfangsfilm ist  beeindruckend für ein solches Spiel. 

🎶 [b][u]Sound[/u][/b]

Musik und Soundeffekte sind ok, auch wenn ich es sehr Schade finde, dass die einzelnen Texte nicht vertont wurden. Auch etwas mehr Atmosphäre in den einzelnen Stücken wäre noch schön gewesen aber im Endeffekt ist die Vertonung ausreichend.

❤︎ [b][u]Fazit [/u][/b]

Insgesamt ein nettes Spiel für einige Stunden. Wer etwas kurzes oder was für Zwischendurch sucht ist hier genau richtig und auch Kartenspielfans kommen auf ihre kosten. 

[quote]Wenn euch die Review gefallen/geholfen hat dann folgt doch unserem [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/8049466/] Reviewprogramm[/url] und wenn ihr mir etwas zu dieser Review mitteilen wollt dann schreibt gerne in die Kommentare.[/quote] | Avis mitigé pour ce jeu de cartes ambiance RPG fantasy.

D'abord, le contexte. 
On joue un gars qui sait pas très bien d'où il vient ni qui il est mais une chose est sûr, le destin du monde repose sur lui...
Ouais.
On pourrait excuser une histoire simpliste si le reste compensait mais non, les dialogues sont longs, le choix des réponses ne sert à rien et du coup tout ce qui et sensé donner une identité au jeu et de la profondeur manque cruellement.

Reste la musique pour s'immerger...et quelle musique! 
Là encore, manque d'identité, impressionante par son air de déjà-entendu (je suis quasiment sûr que c'est du copier-coller) et complètement rébarbative. Etant donné qu'il n'y a qu'une musique pour les phases de combat et que le jeu n'en est qu'une longue suite, j'ai fini, par repect pour mes oreilles, par la couper dans les options.

Du coup, qu'est-ce qu'il reste?
Des parties de cartes type solitaire de windows/poker contre des monstres avec un système de rage, de magie et la possibilité d'avoir en jeu des cartes action/bonus. On se déplace sur la carte en fonction des quêtes à accomplir et voilà tout.

Le jeu est propre, facile à prendre en main, tout est en anglais mais facile à comprendre, la difficulté assez élevée.
Si on vous l'offre ou s'il est en réduction, prenez-le si, comme moi, vous vouliez au moins un jeu de carte dans votre ludothèque.
government psyop

Game Name: Red Orchestra 2: Heroes of Stalingrad with Rising Storm
Reviews:
This game has the best shooter game play I have ever experienced. I have tried so many other ego-shooters and nothing can compete gameplay-wise for my taste. | This game is hard to review. There are a lot of tactics involved in this World War 2 game when it comes down to finding a good position and deciding when to take more territory. Overall great WW2 shooter and map design! On the other hand, the devs did a sloppy job when it came to removing the single player campaign because they were incapable of making it work. I've never heard of a game developer removing this much from a game. It's a first. They also kept the single player achievements and promised to fix it later even though the campaign was removed. Kick the bucket down the road. Then they said the game is too old so the devs won't fix it. There is also an impossible achievement because of a progress bug the devs screwed up on and gave everyone who had the bug an achievement called inb4reset which is not a reward for something the player did but a mistake from the devs  so it was a limited time achievement. Weird and unheard of to get an achievement for the developers mistake for bugging everyone's progress. I just find it very strange. There are a lot of other bugs and problems with the game. It is still a great multiplayer game. So I'll let you decide if this game is right for you. If achievements are not important to you, and you want to get another WW2 shooter, then I say go for it. You also shouldn't expect any bug fixes because support is basically non-existent. | Гениальная игра, погружающая тебя в те страшные времена. Несмотря на то, что маленький онлайн, играть всё равно очень интересно | Best to make new friends and meet unique people, I 100% recommend buying this game as soon it gets on sale!

This game may be ancient but it still holds out great! Especially with the although shy but funny community nonetheless.
Each campaign makes you feel like you're in some story or a movie and it can be really immersive at times.
(I'm looking at you Leica)

This game has made me feel anxious , rage, shed tears, overwhelmed with joy and compassion.

This game is a hidden gem and I hope we meet together in the frontlines!

 | Топ игра, жаль онлайн угасает, но всё равно можно найти сервак с живыми игроками
No Reviews

Classic game. Deserves a sequel. Will never get a sequel. R.I.P. | 在別的平台玩得很開心的一款解謎策略遊戲~~
但STEAM上的版本有兩大缺點：
1.沒有中文，需要自行去找漢化，但由於老遊戲了，載點難找。
2.滿滿BUG~偉大的Ubisoft老問題~~一款遊戲附贈數不清BUG，這點從不讓人意外。 | I beat this on the Xbox and dumped quite a few hours into it. Pretty little puzzle game. | Excellent little strategy game, just wish it were available on more platforms!

Carniça de Tower, uma Disgraça; Muito Chato, um jogo para se perder bastante tempo. | Probably the best tower defense game to have ever been created. Every tower has a use/niche. It has a near perfect difficulty curve for anyone to enjoy. Unfortunately, the sequel does not live up to the original. | If you "play" TD games. You know this was the best. | Good tower defence game with a good level of challenge and opportunities to try and win with different strategies. | I can't recommend this game to a completionist. To achieve the gold medal even on the standard story difficulty you'll most likely have to replay each mission over and over and over again, the scoring is really strict. But if you don't care about that it's a fun tower defense game.
One of the best TD games in the world....

Interesting concept. You play as the force trying to get through a tower defense map. Background is alien wreckage has hit Earth, and you are to investigate. Decent enough. Might want to wait for a discount. | Doesn't run well on Windows 11, but pretty good fun. Considerable challenge too, trying to juggle abilities, placing them properly and choosing which to use at the right time. Not bad. | Anomaly Warzone Earth est un jeu particulier prenant à contresens le Tower Defense.
L'idée est intéressante, simple, efficace, on dirige son Commandant qui peut servir de support à une troupe d'au maximum 6 unités qu'il faudra choisir et placer dans l'ordre de marche de manière stratégique, le convoi avançant sans cesse suivant le parcours que vous lui indiquez.
La campagne et les missions bonus sont intéressantes et pas longue.
Un jeu sympathique à découvrir d'autant plus que de nos jours il ne doit pas être excessif. | Приятный ТД наоборот....
Весьма динамичный и не слишком долгий... прям то что надо... =) | [h2]Anomaly: Warzone Earth[/h2]

Has a total of [b]6[/b] trading cards.
Very good game genre-defining OG classic. | Great FPS practice ground + defense tower. Gotta love it! | fun chill game | why dont the aliens just climb over the walls ?

Game Name: Serious Sam Classic: The First Encounter
Reviews:
Ciddi Sam...
Bir klasik.
Birinci şahıs, hızlı, mermi cehennemi ve yaratık öldürmenin ilk adreslerinden.
Hala oynanabilirliğini koruyan oyunun remastered versiyonlarına da steamden ulaşabilirsiniz. 
Henüz  hiç oynamadıysanız ve bu tarz oyunları seviyorsanız denemelisiniz.
Belirli dönemlerde toplu paketleri yüksek indirime giriyor. | Probably the best Serious Sam game. Lots of big fights, trapped ammo/health pickups, and silliness. You need to quicksave often because the game isn't remotely fair. The first few levels are a bit slow and annoying because you don't have all the weapons yet.

Unless you're playing on tourist/easy, the gameplay isn't just dumb shooting. You have to prioritize enemies and switch weapons constantly, otherwise you will get overwhelmed. It is a unique type of gameplay.

Compared to the  "Classics: Revolution" version: this one works better.
Compared to the HD version (or Fusion), this original version has a few gravity gimmick rooms that weren't ported over. It doesn't matter much.
Compared to The Second Encounter, this has fewer enemy types and weapons, and only one setting (Egypt), but more big difficult fights.
Compared to SS2, this is much less goofy.
Compared to SS3 and later, this has no NPCs talking in your ear, no running, ~no reloading, no aim-down-sights. | Serious Sam, the game that defined a generation of PC shooters. I have beaten the First Encounter like I think 9 times on the different versions, but getting this for mods and stuff is a good decision. Overall you should totally play this game, it's worth it to play the classic first. | Compre este juego por que se lo regale a mi pareja y me lo compre para mi tambien por que tenia modo online y venia con un pack de 3 juegos , hace 1 semana lo jugue por mi pareja en dificultad dificil y fue tan horrible y hermoso a la vez no saber un choto y que el me alla enseñado algunos secreto me salvo pero ufff me hizo enojar demasiado este juego pero es un juegazo ahora voy a jugar el segundo encuentro | Игра обладает замечательной динамикой, интерес к игровому процессу сохраняется до последнего момента, присутствует яркая и насыщенная графика, а также потрясающая музыка. Следует отметить как недостатки скучного финального босса и странную завершающую сцену.
The game has wonderful dynamics, interest in the gameplay persists until the last moment, there are bright and rich graphics, as well as amazing music. It should be noted both the disadvantages of the boring final boss and the strange ending scene.

Game Name: Serious Sam Classic: The Second Encounter
Reviews:
This is the second half of Serious Sam 1. Compared to the First Encounter, this has more environments, more enemy types, more weapons, more gimmicks and new powerups. Once you know how to use the new weapons, this game becomes much easier than the first one. You could say it is more fair/balanced.

There is an HD version of this game which looks better but lacks a few gravity gimmick rooms, and the sounds are changed. | Bu oyunu First Encounter oyunundan daha fazla beğendim First encounter sürekli mısır civarında geçtiği için insanı biraz sıkıyor fakat bu oyunda 3 farklı bölge olması daha etkileyici kılmış oyunu | It's a good game, but a lot of people smack the First Encounter down because it doesn't have as many mods and it doesn't have weapons and enemies. I would rather play TFE than TSE, but that's my opinion. | "Serious Sam: The Second Encounter" - это игра, которая увлекает с первого же запуска. Стремительный темп игры, разнообразие врагов и увлекательный геймплей делают её незабываемым опытом для всех, кто любит динамичные шутеры. Несмотря на то, что игра вышла уже несколько лет назад, она по-прежнему держится на высоте благодаря своей уникальной атмосфере и запоминающимся миссиям. Рекомендую всем, кто еще не познакомился с этим шедевром, попробовать свои силы в борьбе с монстрами и встать на сторону героя Сериуса Сама. | One of the best game of my childhood. I'm Serious.

this is the only way to play the classic versions of serious sam on steam, you get them for free [tfe and tse] among with a new campaign exclusive to serious sam evolution called bright island, among that, a bunch of new extra content has been added, new weapons, new enemies, and more, also introducing steam workshop support, overall this is probably one of the best serious sam games ive ever seen, i heavily reccomend this | Farklı bir oyun değil aslında First-Second encounter oyunlarını oynatıyor burda ama biraz gelişmiş haliyle | if your wondering if its worth it to get revolution over the originals, revolution also gives you the original games so you don't have to pay twice. Revolution just gives you extra stuff. | This game is fun for about 4 levels and then is really annoying. | 英雄萨姆，在上个世纪FPS刚起步时，开辟了一条在现在也很少有的玩法主题
一个人VS一个军队
游戏玩法非常简单，带着远高于所有FPS差不多3倍的弹药，去挑战远远多于一般FPS5倍的敌人
相当于FPS版的无双游戏，大概在同屏数量上，萨姆做到了FPS中的空前绝后
敌人也不仅仅是愚蠢的近战单位，而是包括负责用数量淹死你的冲锋前锋，攻速慢但多的杂兵
配合重型单位以及骚扰远程输出，在后期往往一关的一场战斗，都会有几十个单位蜂拥而来
而你要做的就是像个移动炮台一样，走位输出狂轰滥炸，不要担心弹药因为防守战补给会无限间隔刷新
你只需要专注超度这群，奇形怪状的外星侵略者就行了
英雄萨姆的故事也很神奇，是按照4312的顺序从外星人开始入侵地球（4），地球被外星人毁灭（3）
萨姆穿越回过去（1），开始前往外星人老家（1代资料片），然后踹他外星人BOSS的ASS（2）
不过这个故事目前没有结束，止步于2打到了BOSS老家
只是为了玩初代的话基本买这部就可以了，这部包含了初代本体和资料片二次出击以及额外关卡光明岛
看评论说有HD版，但本来就是老游戏再怎么HD也一个德行区别不大所以我是不在乎这个的
游戏地图设计就是杀杀杀，和找开关，我是觉得开关不难找，毕竟有锁的地方开关都在附近
地图也都不太大找找总能找到，主要是有时候他放开关钥匙的地方，会放在某条路的尽头
你得杀个百八十个敌人才能过去，而且资料片和额外关卡的关卡地形特别容易摔死，就很烦
所以买之前最好确认自己是不是喜欢这种游戏，毕竟对不喜欢的人来说相当于疯狂堆怪X3
可能会比较坐牢，顺便一提完全打通每一关至少需要24小时，地形是摔下即死，稍微忘了快捷存档
摔0死了就要从头开始就挫败感很强，但如果你能适应，这游戏打折也就5块，就会了解到什么叫极具性价比

The only top-down shooter in history which looked like a modern game of its time and not like indie game of some sort. Well, there were games like Half-Life 2 back in 2000s, of course, but not every game was even close to that level. Still, this game starts like horror of some sort and I think it should have kept such style. But apparently devs had different vision. By the way you can try to play it on easy because the game is pretty damn hard. | This is a hard negative review but I cannot put a neutral one so be it then. It is from 2006 but even for these standards the writing is just atrocious - they started strong with some survival horror mechanics just to go full generic mediocre alien shoter clone in just next part where you have just to kill and move and watch not to die - not very much to be expecting from. The voice acting is just bad, the story is just bland and the ending - well it is anticlimactic. Nostalgia prevents me from shitting on this game byt it is not strong enough to pat it on the head. | Топовая для своих лет игрулька .Купил из ностальгии ( как-как найдя в интернете её название ) , но если быть не придирчивым, то неплохой шутер с видом сверху с малым элементом хоррора , а  если по шаманить в папках разрешение и настройки графики , так и ещё графон не самый плохой будет! | cheap and amazing! good game!

Game is fun. Shorter than the previous, sort of like a spin-off. Worth getting it along-side the original on sale.

If you crash, install legacy PhysX: https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/drivers/physx/9_12_1031/physx-9-12-1031-legacy-driver/

If you get graphical glitches, espetially around water: turn off Anti-Aliasing. | Shadowgrounds: Survivor does fix some of the problems with previous game like lackluster physix, voiceacting and story but it is still plagued by bugs from previous game - looking at you shotgun glitch. The game brings overall better experience while writing still has lot to be desired at least it doesn't try to play the horror this time - it just is shoter from beginning to start, it doesn't try to scare us just it points us into general direction and asks to shot things. While it is not much it cuts enough to be a better part despite being around half as short. | Had a little trouble getting this to run at first, but after installing the legacy PhysX drivers like people say then it ran great.

Overall this game is some run-and-gun dumb fun! It borrows a lot from Doom, but the mechanics and perspective are quite unique. I love that it doesn't outstay it's welcome - I can imagine if they had artificially stretched it out then it would have gotten very boring, but the pacing seems just right.

One things that's quite a shame is I wish they had polished this a bit more, from the menu screens to a little bit of jankyness in game, I feel like a little more dev time could have made this shine. But that aside, just go have some quick fun with this here and there.

Trine - первая игра в серии с одноименным названием. Жанр игры называется 2.5д, потому что все объекты в приницпе 3д, но при этом угол обзора дается только через бок, но это не мешает игре быть веселой и занимательной. Каждая игра выходит в промежуток в 4 года, кроме 3 частей игры, о которой я напишу позже.

Геймплей: мы играем за трех персонажей сразу и просто переключаемся между ними, чтобы сражаться или решать головоломки. Персонажи: Рыцарь Понтий, Воровка Зоя и Волшебник Амадей. Эти трое были зачарованы магическим артефактом под названием Trine, и теперь игроку предстоит разузнать что это за артефакт и как перестать быть связанным с персонажами.

Кооператив: в игре присутствует кооп режим, который я не пробовал, но людям, которым нравятся играть в одиночку, проходить игру будет удобно.

Кол-во ачивок - 33 (легкие); кол-во карточек - 8. | 6.5/10 還算很有意思的小遊戲，可以全程跟朋友連線(最多三名玩家)!! 可以趁特價買起來玩:)
 | Trine is a bit old but the visuals are still amazing. Played through with my gf and we had loads of laughs and good times. | 很难想象这居然是10多年前的游戏质量，无论是音乐，画质，建模，游戏性简直都太棒了，一个个充满着制作者巧妙布局的关卡，配合上唯美而又动听的音乐，美轮美奂的场景和惊奇的宝物道具，轻松而又惬意的剧情，虽然过程不长，但是依然能感受到创作者在里面投入的心血，感谢你们让我体验到了一个魔幻而又充满搞笑气氛的奇幻史诗世界！10分！ | Beautiful visuals combined with quirky characters, great score and a nice combination of puzzles and 2D combat.

i really want this game to succeed. its a fun combination of RTS and FPS that is extremely rare to find. there are, however, two problems that make this not recommended.

first and foremost, dead game. has been dead for a while, and games like this tend to need players to unlock its best gameplay.

but the most important thing that holds this back is the bots. i've played countless RTS games against AI and the likes. there are plenty of RTS games where there also is little to no players, but i enjoy them because i can still play a typical game against an AI opponent. in this game, there is no RTS commander, and therefore basically no reason to play because almost everything this game is relies on that.

RIP to a real one | Nuclear Dawn 2?

Beautiful Game. For its time, unmatched. The campaign is amazing (Go UEF!) way cooler than Star Wars | An excellent RTS.

Had a good friend not introduced me to [b]Supreme Commander[/b], I'd have never known about it!

It features a great storyline with three fantastic factions to play as.

The main thing that sets [b] Supreme Commander [/b] apart from other RTS, is the larger sized maps, as well as a wider arsenal of units including massive experimental units that you can build. The way you build units is also unique; you can queue units from multiple factories in order to create gigantic armies - there's a wide array of land, sea and air units to choose from.

The economy of [b] Supreme Commander [/b] is you trying to maintain a delicate balance of mining as much [i]metal[/i] as possible with being able to produce enough [i]energy[/i] in order to keep churning out armies non-stop.

You really have to play [b] Supreme Commander [/b] in order to experience it. | oyun fena değil campaining için aldım çok zor amk zibilyon tane tank ucak bilmemne kaos var yıkamıyorsun cok uzun soluklu binlerce tank üretmen lazım bunu yapman için kaynak toplaman lazım onun içinde elektrik üretmen alzım bunun yanında sana saldıran adamlara def yapman lazım vb yaşlandım amk | Un excellent jeu qui a mal vieilli... Probablement le meilleur jeu de stratégie, qui met un grand coup dans les dents de l'enfer qu'est la micro-gestion.

Mais... l'UI minuscule avec les écrans modernes (c'est à dire à partir de 1080p), l'impossibilité de changer les touches (pourquoi??) et la nécessité d'utiliser les flèches et le pavé numérique, ça en fait une expérience désagréable. 

Il suffirait d'un petit patch qui apporte une option d'échelle d'interface, et le changement des touches.

Quel dommage... | The game is absolutely amazing. I've played it multiple times.

This is the last game of this scale the console version killed the series which was kinda surprising.

Huge maps with tons of units all over the place shooting is fun. | Потрясающая стратегия, в ней столько ностальгии. Вы играете за командующего, строите свою армию, экономику и атакуете врагов. Можно поиграть с союзниками. Здесь можно поиграть со знакомыми (лучше чтоб они знали эту игру хорошо), с нпс, также можно с рандомными игроками но к сожалению онлайн плохой. Имеются некие бесящие баги в самих нпс да и в игре, но это не критично. + гораздо больше. Может соберемся и сыграем по сетке?:-)) Вообщем недооцененная потрясающая игра, всем советую!!! P.S. Ещё самое прекрасное - это когда ты запускаешь на кого-то ядерку и смотришь прекрасное зрелище))) | Very ugly 3D RTS game with very clunky controls BUT

I find myself actually having a lot of fun with this one more than most shockingly enough. This game masters the pacing issue that many RTS games lack. Its slower but not in a Northgard way (IE very small pop cap, disasters, ect)

The best way I can describe it is: Take star craft, right? Now imagine that instead of finite resources you have resource generators and storage, and instead of paying for stuff outright and waiting for the production to finish, you pay over the course of production in smaller incriments, and instead of destroying everything, you just have to destroy your opponents commander - which is a mobile unit with a lot of health that can essentially rebuild an entire base from scratch 

This game is a turtles paradise because the defensive structures are really good and there are no real third party objectives. You can capture additional resource points if you'd like but they arent truly necessary if you balance your production properly

Amazing gameplay, its shocking that I havent heard about this until just now and its equally shocking that no game has really tried to replicate its more casual appeal. | Бомба, багато покращень порівняно з супрім командер, кампанія цікава, більше мап, + нова раса серафімів, обмеження на 1000 юнітів, загалом топ.

9/10 (є українізатор від спільноти, шукати в посібниках) | > Be me
> Aeon endgame
> UEF Turtle with copious amounts of shield generators and defenses
> Idea
> Build Czar
> Banzai charge to UEF base
> Cripple their eco with Czar corpse and a couple of Coronas and Shockers
> Win

I love this game
Interesting Puzzle game with good presentation, a short but worthwhile experience

This game was designed by joyless pedants with zero sense of how to design a game like this. Why design a game where every click must be a meticulous decision when the enemy just RNG-swarms your location, and your teammates just rush out to die?

Not recommended, even on sale. | It's a really cool strategy game that plays async.

I go home from my job working as an engineer to play a game where you work as engineer, and I wouldn't have it any other way.

Great gameplay, with an inspiring and motivating soundtrack to keep you trudging through real headscratching puzzles. The soundtrack itself is great to play while doing programming or very mentally intensive work.

The fishcake is yummy. | This has been an insane challenge but super fair, with minor exceptions*. If you like this sort of thing, this is EXACTLY the sort of thing you'll like.

Thank you, Zachtronics, for making such an amazing game. This is not a Sudoku or Sokoban where there is exactly one perfectly-logical solution to each puzzle. Instead, each player invents their own solutions -- and some can be more efficient than others, in multiple mutually-exclusive ways. As Zach Barth said in old interviews, SpaceChem is an example of "design-based games, which present you with a goal, perfect information, and a set of combinable tools to achieve it... they're essentially asking you to 'invent' a solution to a problem instead of merely 'finding' the solution." This kind of creative puzzle-solving is what I had imagined a STEM PhD program would be like (though it turns out PhDs are not really mostly about this; but that's a whole other story).

And... after a decade and a half, HOLY COW I finally beat it! Without hints**! I know many others have beat it before me, but it's still satisfying to know I've done something SpaceChem's designer Zach Barth has (according to old interviews) never done himself.

WOW has this ever been a long journey. These little molecules and waldos have accompanied me like a white whale through so many life stages. When SpaceChem came out in 2011, I started playing the game and enjoyed it a ton, but I got stuck and took a break. A few years later, I picked it up again as a distraction from grad school, but only reached the 4th or 5th world out of 9 -- before taking another (loooong) break. A decade later, after getting tenure, my treat to myself was to tackle SpaceChem seriously again... and now it's finally done -- with my kids staying up late to cheer as we beat the final boss.

Looking at the Steam-friends leaderboards, I'm also amused to see where my friends apparently quit playing. The quantum-physics PhD tunneled out in the 3rd world; the Twitch data scientist stopped streaming in the 5th; the software engineer and the IT manager suffered packet loss in the 6th. Somehow, I alone persevered to traverse the desolate worlds 7 through 9. Steam says I've spent 60ish hours on the game; I'd guess around 30 hours covered the first 6 worlds and the other 30 hours covered the last 3 worlds. Many of my solutions aren't optimized and beautiful (especially Don't Fear The Reaper; holy crap I made an ugly mess there) -- but they are mine, my own inventions, my hard-fought victories.

Once again, thank you to Zach and Zachtronics.

* The minor exceptions to fairness: (1) Every non-boss level tells you exactly how many molecules you need to make, but the boss-levels don't. It can be orders of magnitude harder to devise a solution that'll use up all molecules equally and produce an unending stream of hits, vs a good-enough solution that's unbalanced but just enough to beat the boss... yet you don't know how many hits each boss will take until you beat it. Most take around 3 hits -- but not all. (2) The game doesn't seem to allow multiple save slots for a level. If I try one solution and it doesn't QUITE work and I want to try another one, I have to get rid of my first solution and start the second... and if the second fails, I can't revert back to the first. I could take a screenshot of an initial solution, then remake it from scratch later if I need to, but aaargh! This is a small but extremely frustrating flaw in the game's interaction design. HOWEVER, I didn't realize until after beating the game that there's a dev-authorized "community edition" beta version which DOES allow multiple save slots per level. Look it up. Argh.

** "I beat it, without hints": Ok, technically, for the very last 2 boss levels I eventually looked up how many hits it takes to defeat each boss. See above -- I think this is unfair imperfect information. Besides, all the earlier bosses die after around 3 hits, but these two didn't die after 3... nor after 4... so I gave in and looked it up, because there's a big difference between "incrementally tweak my initial solution to stretch from 3 hits to 5 or 6 hits" vs "start again from scratch to allow for 10 or 20 or 40 hits." But I didn't look at anyone else's solutions, merely the number of hits required. | Great puzzle game, challenging and engaging! | I'm wondering why I'm playing this game, is it any different than going to github and submitting a feature? | This is a game made for people with massive brains.

I played this game so much in 2012 back on the xbox 360 and its awesome that it still sees updates. i bought it again for the nostalgia not really thinking it would hold up to games from 2024 but i was heavily surprised that ive had more fun on this than most games ive played recently. | played a few hours. DD Awakened is dead and no longer updated. DD2 was okay. DD1 has aged like fine wine. The graphics are stylish to the point they really dont show much age, not like other games of this era do. Would recomend. | pretty interesting game. kinda hit the point where endgame gets stale and u do the same thing but grinding for very miniscule upgrades. 

tower stacking makes it a lot less interesting but kinda required with how grindy it is. wish there was an option for no trading but increased rates. 

information should be more public with droprates/item quality. having to dig through discords to figure out how certain game mechanics work, or how some areas are just terrible to farm feels really bad. 

most of my time is afk doing survival waves. 

worth trying if you really like tower defence games and are looking for something different. buy everything on sale tho. 

 | Over all, a absolutely amazing game, the big issue I have is recently there was a 48 hour downtime for ranked (The only way to safely play multiplayer, and obtain achievments), which is what it is. But they took away access to the ranked saves which people had poured hours into, normally this isn't a bad thing as downtime will end. But as it has now ended, ranked specifically for redux no longer functions while standard ranked does. We have 0 comment on wether this is intentional or if something broke. But me and many others could have just lost hoursss of time without warning or chance to export saves. And any mention of this is ignored. | Timeless classic, self contained and fun tower defense RPG.
a 3D tower defense for people who think Orcs must die! is too hands on, and for people who think bloons tower defense is too D.

Really loved this game, the music still sticks with me, and the last few levels are quite a fun challenge! | [h2]Before the Echo[/h2]

Has a total of [b]5[/b] trading cards. | This game is amazing

[h1]
Forget about furious running and shooting this is RPG Sam... Walk around the map and fight some random encounters. Gameplay is somewhat turn based and each action takes one turn. You can choose between shooting, swapping weapons or using an item. While in action phase you're able to dodge incoming enemies and bullets by going up or down. Music feels a bit melancholic but it's not the main con. What drives me insane are encounters which happen too frequently. On top of that gameplay gets repetitive very quickly as you choose similar strategy most of the time. At least you don't have to worry about ammo which basically is infinite for each weapon. Along the way you will experience some humorous dialogs and collect random keys to unlock next areas. Each stage have some sort of boss battle at the end. Basically game feels like an old dungeon crawlers with turn based strategy fights in the vein of RPG games. I think this game is not that serious. 5/10 still if you like Serious Sam you might wanna check it out and complete.
[/h1] | Fajne, ale za krótkie. | Прикольная игрушка
Je ne suis pas fan de ce type de jeu.

The game's got an incredible replay value, thanks to the shitload of items and upgrades available, all the different unlockable characters, all the great bosses and secrets to uncover, the dark and unsettling lore and story, and all the alternate endings. It's a very challenging game, even frustrating at times, as it can feel almost impossible (some of the final bosses are really tough, and you really need to memorize their attack patterns), but it's a really great game if you take your time to learn it. The art-style is grotesque, and the atmosphere is oppressing, but these things combined work well with the somewhat bleak world and characters. Given the game's roguelike nature, RNG can sometimes fuck you big time, and some runs kind of feel doomed from the start; other times you get fucked towards the end, but there's always something new to find or to unlock, so no run feels completely wasted. My only real complaint with this version is that at times the performance is kinda shit as the game lags/feels unresponsive at times (maybe because it was made in Flash, not really sure), and you can die due to stuff out of your control.

Still, The Binding of Isaac's a classic and really worth the price. | playing this game on the school computers on a browser was so fun, would recommend if you like the classic NES Zelda game | 8/10 O jogo é muito bom, leve e divertido para passar o tempo. A única razão pela qual não posso dar uma nota de 10 é porque a platina é incrivelmente difícil. No final, só resta a pergunta: quem está realmente preso aqui, Isaac ou você? | Best action rougelike bullet hell game! I'd say it's worth to try once in your lifetime. [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/TrueBlueReviews#curation]If you enjoyed reading this review, please follow [u]True Blue Reviews[/u] for more recommendations![/url] | A Twin-Stick Bullet Hell style game.

Ahh, Bullet Hell games, how much I love you... Or atleast love screaming at you. This game is more of a Bullet Hell Lite though, Still great fun but with none of the insane difficulty of a screen full of things really trying to kill you. 

Gameplay-wise, this game handles with all the grace and maneuverability of a twin-stick shooter... So, depending on how good you are at them great to middling. I always manage to lose my grip on one of the control sticks whenever I play, but I still manage to suvive somehow.

Graphically, the screen-shots speak for themselves. Bright, vibrant colours, varied enemies and stages, a third thing... I think this is one of the prettiest games that I own.

The music in this game matches the gameplay perfectly, so much so that I forget sometimes that the sound effects and the musical score are seperated.


I may be somewhat biased in this review, because I have always been a sucker for games like this, but I do fully recommend this game if you enjoy pretty colours with a laid-back feel... Well, as laid back as a Bullet Hell game can be.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=frDdujwgOo8 | 二维的弹幕射击游戏。玩过东方、怒首领蜂、雷电等等系列的玩家上手应该没什么问题。

特点在于敌人只在一个限定的空间里刷新，你的火力可以指向任意的方向。有点像东方的符卡。也有擦弹奖励。
bomb 随时间自动恢复，恢复速度不算很慢。不过 bomb 作用范围仅限于自机周围一小圈。火力只有吃道具限时强化，没有永久增加。

难度跨度还是不错的。easy 应该随便都能打通，但即使是 easy 带的挑战也是很难的。insane 第8关就过不去了……永夜抄只能过 normal 的水平就是这样啦……

判定点不小。自机在屏幕中间，没有安定点可言，最重要的是密集的弹幕很容易让你找不到自机，不像东方那样即使看上去满屏只有子弹但至少你知道你在哪。

 | [u] GAMEPLAY [/u]
Thanks in no small part to the seminal 1980s classics like Robotron and Asteroids, we now have more twin-stick shooters than we can swing a twin-stick at. The principle is the same as it's always been: kill tons of enemies and avoid bazillions of missiles. Screens are confined by boundaries so the action is tight and restricted and incredibly intense. Its main gimmick, like Waves, is a slightly overpowered special attack which kills anything within a small radius around your ship.  Each level lasts about 40-60 seconds. Most enemies have one hit-point but with power-ups aplenty the usual sight is to see a monumental stream of bullets issuing forth from your ship and swarms of enemies exploding into smithereens. 

[u] PRESENTATION & DESIGN [/u]
The start-screen doubles as the level-select screen so moving your ship to the right scrolls through and uncovers the map of levels. Be warned though, it's a badly designed mess with no explanation or description given as to how navigating through the game actually works. Sound is a mixed bag as well; pumping, trance-like tunes get you into the zone but while in the menus the peculiar soundtrack coughs and splutters like a badly distorted fart. Graphics are fine, comparing similarly to the game's closest competitor, Mutant Storm Reloaded. The progression system in Scoregasm is disorientating to say the least. You get a score at the end but this gets lost to a broken online connection. However the high-score, best combo score and rank (S, A, B, C, D, E and F) for each individual level, if beaten, are stored and can be viewed on the stats page afterwards. 

[u] CONCLUSION [/u]
Scoregasm still remains one of the most intense Asteroids-inspired / twin-stick shoot ‘em ups of all time. Clearing tricky levels by a split second through skill and dexterity is always greeted with satisfying relief. Although it may not have the polish and class of a Geometry Wars it gets a lot more things right than other games of this ilk such as Bullet Candy, Gran Vitreous or Death Ray Manta. On the other hand it would benefit from giving the player the option to play individual levels (like in Mutant Storm Reloaded). The alternative Challenge levels are also too ridiculously tough for casual players. Still, the sheer enjoyment gained from the main part of the game is immense and largely makes up for these minor quibbles.

3/5

I've had this gem for a very long time and just hadn't played it very much until a few months ago.  Definitely different from HOI4!  I enjoy that I can control almost every little detail of the gameplay without automating the units.  I just set the game speed to the second lowest and have the message settings set to pause the game when my units are attacked or when I win or lose a battle so I can react to each of the MANY events that require my immediate attention.  It definitely feels more like I'm making decisions and issuing orders from the strategic level all the way down to the tactical level.  Don't get me wrong - there is a STEEP learning curve!  I'm still finding mechanics that give me more options (underground resistance cells can spawn others in adjacent provences). All of your supplies, upgrades, reinforcements, production queue, and consumer goods are created from one pool of "Industrial Capacity" that needs constant attention and allocation.  You need to balance your leadership points between research, diplomacy, espionage, and officer training.  You have to decide what you will research with the finite pool of leadership points you have!  You will overlook critical research because it has a mundane name and description until you read and understand the stats boost it gives.  These might not be selling points if you're looking for a point-and-click, automated game that looks like it would be more comfortable on your phone.  It may not have the 3D animated sprites of infantry running in place at each other as they attack and defend 3D terrain.  It may not have railway guns, mulberry harbors, or supply depots.  It will challenge you.  It will make you feel stupid at times.  You will experience CRUSHING defeats - and you will come back and fight harder than before!  I whole-heartedly recommend this game for anyone who wants to spend months of their spare time slogging it out on the Eastern Front, or in the jungles and alpine plateaus of South America, or ANYWHERE.  Can I give this game six stars?  PDX should be making games like this still! Buy it! Play it! [h1]暴力美学的狂欢，但别被“血”蒙蔽双眼！[/h1]
[spoiler]从库存堆里掏出来，游戏通关哩，撒花~❀❀❀[/spoiler]
虽然游戏没有中文，但剧情简单粗暴，简直就是现代版的金庸武侠！老大怀疑主角的忠心，让他杀掉自己的爱人以示投名状，闪客不忍不从，于是老大派出手下四大手下来追杀这对主角夫妇。主角闪客死里逃生，但爱人惨死[典中典]。七年之后，深陷犯罪集团阴谋的Shank，将用最残暴的方式踏过地下世界的尸山血海。这场浸透鲜血的复仇之旅，每一帧都迸发着怒火与决绝。

《Shank》是一款致敬经典的横版清关动作游戏，由获奖工作室Klei Entertainment打造。在这部充满邪典电影风格的暴力美学作品中，你将化身主角Shank，在血肉横飞的战场中体验极致的杀戮快感——敌人如潮水般涌来，连击系统酣畅淋漓，头目战设计震撼人心！游戏于2010年10月26日登陆Steam平台，并根据玩家反馈优化了操作手感与平衡性调整。准备好用刀枪开辟血路，开启一场复仇狂欢吧！

[h2]核心特点：[/h2]
[h3]暴力漫画艺术风格[/h3]
由资深导演Jeff Agala操刀，以流畅如动态漫画的分镜与动画，呈现黑帮世界的黑暗美学。画面确实帅炸，但有时候血喷得太多，我都分不清自己在砍人还是砍番茄酱瓶子。
[h3]武器连击系统[/h3]
自由组合刀、枪、链锯等致命武器，创造千变万化的连击招式，让敌人永远猜不到下一击从何而来。
[h3]电影级过场动画[/h3]
通过精美动画片段沉浸式体验Shank的复仇史诗，每一场杀戮都有故事的温度。
[h3]残酷头目对决[/h3]
8场风格迥异的史诗级Boss战，用策略与操作碾压身形数倍于你的疯狂对手。
[h3]本地双人合作模式[/h3]
邀请好友共同血战！在独立于主线的合作剧情中，挑战成群的武装暴徒，揭开单机故事的前传秘辛。

[h2]缺点/不足吐槽：[/h2]
[h3]没有中文[/h3]
虽然剧情简单易懂，但没中文还是有点劝退。尤其是过场动画里的对话细节，Klei工作室，你们是觉得我们中国玩家都自带翻译器吗？
[h3]流程偏短以及老套[/h3]
动画确实好看，但剧情有点老套，典型的“你杀我老婆，我杀你全家”套路。普通模式通关大概2.5小时左右，虽然爽快但意犹未尽。刚进入状态，游戏就结束了，感觉像是吃了一顿快餐，还没吃饱就没了。
[h3]重复性较高[/h3]
砍完第100个小兵后，我已经分不清他们是谁了，反正都是“血包”。敌人种类和场景设计有点单一，后期容易审美疲劳。
[h3]操作门槛[/h3]
连击系统虽然爽，但对新手不太友好，手残党可能会被虐到自闭。特别是我明明按的是“砍人”，为什么角色在“跳舞”？手残党慎入！按错一个键，可能就从“华丽连招”变成“原地发呆”“罚站”。Boss战设计很棒，但某些Boss的难度曲线堪比过山车，前一秒还在虐菜，下一秒强度就上来了。

[hr][/hr]
总结：
《Shank》是一款充满暴力美学的横版动作游戏，适合喜欢爽快战斗和复仇剧情的玩家。虽然有些小缺点，但整体体验依然值得一试。如果你是动作游戏爱好者，或者只是想找个发泄压力的方式，那么《Shank》绝对能满足你！

评分：8/10
推荐人群：动作游戏爱好者、暴力美学爱好者、手速达人、有朋友的幸运儿。
慎入人群：手残党、剧情党、单身狗（双人模式警告）（单身狗默默流泪）。

最后一句：如果你能接受没有中文和短流程，那就准备好刀枪，加入这场复仇狂欢吧！ | 10年的神作 boss战是神 打击感是神 连击系统是神 谁他瑪用键鼠通关的这辈子有福了 | Хоть играл и не много, но игра всё равно способна вызвать ностальгические чувства, особенно запоминающаяся рисовка. Сама игра по себе не сложна, да и повествование ничем не выделяется, но эта мясорубка всё равно может зацепить, особенно любителей жанра. В целом, несмотря на простоту сюжета, «Шанк» дарит незабываемые эмоции и отлично подойдёт тем, кто ценит яркие и энергичные экшены с элементами файтинга. | It's alright from what i recall, you only get like 3 hours worth of a game for whatever the price is. | The game is begging for a remaster, but Klei Entertainment just keep looking at Don't Starve and nothing else in their past game catalog other than Mark of the Ninja.

Благодаря Super Meat Boy я узнаю о тех старых играх, что прошли мимо меня в свое время. Это игра не стала исключением - открытие персонажа Commander Video впоследствии привело меня сюда. Игра авто-раннер без права на ошибку - умер, начинай все заново. Окей, привыкнуть можно. Первый мир абсолютный среднячок, вывозит только тем что он служит ролью "обучения", второй уже намного лучше в плане атмосферы и дизайна. Третий... Дайте мне немного времени, и после плюсов я обязательно вернусь к нему :)
+ Дизайн уровней. Конкретно 2-ого и 3-его Мира, несмотря на то что цель всей игры НЕ ОТВЛЕКАТЬСЯ на посторонние мельтешащие объекты, окружение достаточно проработано, и довольно атмосферно.
+ Музыка максимально средняя. Здесь нет никаких раскачивающих тебя треков (кроме босс-файтов) и все держится на (почти) одной и той же мелодии. Но напомню - в чем главная цель игры? Проходя по 40 раз уровень уже и не думаешь о ее существовании.
+ В игре есть несколько разнообразных боссов. Из них самый приятный 2-ой, у остальных ты больше проходишь сам уровень, нежели босса. 

И на этом плюсы у игры заканчиваются. Я старался выделить в них то что меня удивило в начале игры, но так как я (как и лишь 7% комьюнити) дошли до 3-его Мира, больше хорошего сказать мне нечего. Время минусов:
- Авто-раннер без права на ошибку. Эта игра считай похоронила себя еще на начале, ведь чем не приятное чувство когда ты дошел до середины/конца уровня, врезался в объект и начинаешь все заново :))) Ну, ты учтешь свою ошибку и таки пройдешь уровень? Что-же, это работает так до определенных уровней, 1-11, 1-12, 2-9, и боже бл*ть (за мат не извиняюсь) уровни с 3-9 по 3-11. Здесь уже играет роль не только запоминание паттерна, но и насколько долго хватит тебя и твоего терпения, из раза в раз проходя [Интересные] и [Реально увлекательные] уровни.
- Разных Миров 3, но объекты в них играют одну и ту же роль, просто имея другую текстуру. В 1-ом Мире ты еще не знал чего ждать от игры, и все было в новинку, но потом у разработчиков кончилась фантазия. Удивительно как с таким "разнообразием" игру растянули на целых 33 уровня (не считая боссов)
- Кто тот гений из разработчиков, что решил добавить уровень 1-11 не в соответствующий его уровню сложности Мир? Если верить достоверности процентажа ачивок (на случай, если они не были сломаны долгое время) его прошло лишь 11% игроков. Таким образом большая часть комьюнити (89%) просто напросто отсеялась от игры, так и не осилив его. Все эти 3к положительных отзывов это те самые 11%? Или большая часть оценила лишь 1-ый Мир, который слабее чем последующие во всех смыслах?
- Ну и на сладкое - бонусные ретро уровни. Сами по себе они простые, но единственная цель их существования - получение Идеального счета на уровне. Да, вот только...если ты пропустишь хотя-бы один слиток, перепроходи оригинальный уровень заново, просто чтобы иметь еще одну попытку. Что мешало отделить их, упростив и так непростую задачу тем трем калекам что решили пройти все 33 испытания на Идеально - загадка...

Игра не дает изначально знать о себе как о максимально сложной, карающей и жесткой, but here we are - игру прошло меньше 4% игроков (я в их числе, к счастью) а большая ее часть застряла на 1-ом Мире. Хорошая работа :) | Играл я как-то в Super Meat Boy.. И меня очень привлёк Командир Видео, поэтому я решил поиграть в BIT.TRIP RUNNER.

Игра замечательная! Очень весёлая, с хорошей графикой и замечательной музыкой! Может быть для нынешнего времени кому-то может показаться скучной, но для тех годов это был пик, да и я в принципе ни разу ни заскучал.

[b] С целью просто поиграть: [/b]
Рекомендую всем, уверен вам всем очень понравится! Хорошая игра на вечер!

[b] С целью получить все достижения: [/b]
Если у вас железные нервы - желаю вам удачи. [u] Слабонервным я не рекомендую пытаться проходить игру полностью, я серьёзно. [/u] Куча сложных уровней и ретро челленджи будут заставлять вас ненавидеть эту игру. Ретро челлендж 3-2 вы будете проклинать из-за факта присутствия в нём безумного тайминга.
Я прошёл игру полностью на 100%, и на получении последнего достижения был очень измучен. Однако это не меняет моё отношение к игре - я всё ещё считаю её достаточно хорошей.

[b] Дополнение: [/b]
С момента выхода BIT.TRIP RERUNNER я больше рекомендую вам пойти поиграть в именно в RERUNNER, потому что он гораздо лучше обычного BIT.TRIP RUNNER во всех аспектах.
Но если вы хотите купить игру для ностальгической атмосферы - покупайте это!

P.S. Удалите ретро челленджи из игры!!!1!!11 | I personally hate the developer of this game
it's a good game but it works hardly with MacOs 15.2

Great game, kind of hard to 100%. It can get frustrating but nothing outrageous, it's a bit longer than what you'd expect but it's very entertaining if you put something on the background, would recommend. | A beautiful puzzle platformer, cast in a lovely ever-changing set of worlds, in which most of the colour is found in the background.

You play as a ball, or sphere, as the game describes it, and you have to use your environment to complete a large collection of puzzles. Some levels allow you to flip gravity, to brake, to sprint or dash, some levels even have pinball paddles for you to control, or contraptions for you to ride. There's tons of obstacles to discover, and in some cases, use to your advantage.

Looking at the art style, I had an inkling who developed the game, and lo and behold, I was correct. The same person who created the Knytt series, created this, and it shows with how much passion was poured into it. Honestly, you should really give this game a go, it's criminally underrated and will pose a serious challenge in certain sections!

A really good traditional roguelike(if you wish to play on permadeath) got me into roguelikes back in the day. It is still an amazing game, runs can last 7-8 hours assuming you get to the Dredmor level which is level 10. If for some reason you think thats too much, you can always tick an option to shorten the levels and gain more exp. 

Unfortunately the dev team disbanded and went bankrupt after the failure that was [i] Clockwork Empires [/i] , but it is still a timeless classic with workshop mod support and great expansion packs. The game is full of references to other games from its music to it's memes to your own character's portrait being it a doom reference.

The game also had 3 expansion packs (1 free) that heavily increased the replayability of the game tremendously.
My only real criticism of this game is that it's [b]not really made with controllers in mind[/b], so it's a hard game to recommend if you own a [b] steam deck [/b] or wanna play laid back.

Overall i give this a 9/10 , if you want to play a traditional roguelike that doesn't look like [i]unreadable ASCII gibberish[/i], this is one of the best games to introduce yourself to the roots of the [b]Traditional Roguelike Genre[/b].
 | This game is an extraordinary experience, and I've likely barely scratched the surface of what it has to offer.

The text written in the game is 100% pure comedy gold, through and through.

The builds you can make are bizarre, fun, and interesting.

I've yet to delve into the crafting system, and I've yet to actually finish the game, but I absolutely adore everything about this game so far.

Also, I just kicked an entire Monster Zoo to bits and smithereens as a vampire. Worth it. | this game scratches some kind of itch. I just wish it were easier to play on steam deck | !!!Game features an un-obtainable achievement (added recently) | Still waiting for a sequel.

Legitimately a fun and unique setting for a game. The single player is also fun and interesting, a shame this game is so unknown, just like bloody good time. | Hard to recommend now but the game is fun and I had a lot of fun times with The Ship playing with friends. It just feels like a corpse of what it once was and makes me crave for those days of coming home from school and playing games with friends <3. Buggy as all h3ll though :( | Honestly better than the remaster, cool new game mechanic for 2006 | jogo bom pra passar o tempo. e divertido tambem!

This game used to be fun as heck....almost 20 years ago now. I'd still recommend it to the kiddos looking to check out what we used to play on steam legacy software. |  "Для совсем одиноких."

Не знаю стоит ли вообще писать этот обзор сейчас. ведь вряд ли кто-то посмотрит на эту игру, когда есть ремейк. Но всё же.

Если вы знаете как устроен основной режим в The Ship, то вам будет не сложно освоиться здесь. Тот же принцип, те же карты. Единственное отличие - сюжетная подача. Здесь есть то объяснение, которого не хватало мультиплеерной игре. Почему вы на корабле? Почему должны убивать друг друга? 

В общем и целом добавить нечего. Это просто та весёлая игра - The Ship - просто для совсем одиноких. Тем не менее, я её рекомендую. Только не тем ограниченным людям, которые не в состоянии оценить продукт объективно. | The Ship ist für zwischendurch sehr unterhaltsam. Die Missionen sind abwechslungsreich und Witzig gestaltet. 

Ich denke, das der Singleplayer-Modus ehr zum kennen lernen des Spiels gedacht ist. Denn die KI agiert durchschnittlich bis schwach. | Прекрасный сингл как для такой игры. Весьма короткий, проходится ~2 часа. Хорошая графика с не менее интерестным сюжетом.
Также присутствует русский язык.
К покупке обязательно рекомендую
10/10
P.S Баги тоже в комплекте, не беспокойтесь | Фактически это продолжение tutorial. Т.е. одно большое обучение разбитое на несколько заданий и знакомящее с местной механикой. Крайне рекомендую перед игрой с живыми игроками его пройти.

Game Name: Sins of a Solar Empire®: Rebellion
Reviews:
This game has the reputation of being one of the best RTS games, but I don't really see it. It straddles the line between traditional/action RTS (think WC3/SC:BW or AoE2) and 4X (Stellaris, Endless Space 2) and ultimately ends up not being terribly good on either front.
Maybe I haven't delved deep enough, apparently there are people who invest hundreds of hours into this, but I'm just not hooked after a couple of games against the AI. Pass. | It would be great if not for titans - it destroy fun and make it unplayable. 0/10 You can not turn them off. | Впервые встречаю стратегию где нет кампании, но игра, хорошая. Вазари с их порталами рулят! но и у остальных свои приколы тоже есть. 10 из 10 планетарных бомбардировок уже колонизированных планет за ЧТК! | Sins of a Solar Empire
